effect_entries.effect:
Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic:regular-damage}.  User vanishes for one turn, becoming immune to attack, and hits on the second turn.

This move ignores the effects of []{move:detect} and []{move:protect}.

This move cannot be selected by []{move:sleep-talk}.
effect_entries.short_effect: User vanishes, dodging all attacks, and hits next turn.  Hits through Protect and Detect.
